t: Recently there has been a flurry of 'order grabbing' apps—Rakutenshop, Shopkick, Topshop 360, OMG Burse—which pay commission for grabbing orders from shopping websites such as Amazon, Wish, Shopee, etc. Is this a legit opportunity or a new MLM scam? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 12): It's totally SCAM according to my conclusion. I have used these 5 to 6 similar apps and also invested small amounts and earned something and loss also. My conclusion is saying that all these apps are created by a people of international group/ may be some Chinese, some Malasya,...
